title: Run Rebecca, run!
creator_credit: Peter Maxwell, Brendon Lunney and Independent Productions (AU)
brief_description: While on a photographic expedition Rebecca Porter finds herself on Lonesome Island where she meets Manuel, a South American ship’s deserter who missed the recently announced amnesty and who is now in fear of arrest and deportation. Manuel tries to stop Rebecca leaving the Island until the Police have stopped looking for him but Rebecca has other plans. Starring Henri Szeps, John Stanton, Mary Ann Severne, Adam Garnett and Simone Buchanan. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
